features.name: Product Superiority
features.description: It features a fast transmission efficiency, a powerful compatibility and interchangeability, a small size and a high precision (≤1μm)

features.name: Start Up Mode
features.description: The probe is started in two ways including using power-on code and receiving two kinds of infrared modulating signals

features.name: Signal Transmission
features.description: Infrared coding is used to transmit signals between the probe and the receiver. It is resistant to interference and vibration

features.name: Field Of Use
features.description: It can be used in various system spindle processing centers and various products (such as mobile phones, computers, electronics, communication, automobiles and molds)
